publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5807.1 Robin Harper: Brian Pack Inquiry - Single Farm Paymentâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5807) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "; acknowledges the many environmental benefits that sustainable agriculture can deliver, including tackling climate change and increasing biodiversity, and considers that future support should take account of such wider public benefits."
